metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17175 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In the marshmallow library before 2.15.1 and 3.x before 3.0.0b9 for Python, the schema "only" option treats an empty list as implying no "only" option, which allows a request that was intended to expose no fields to instead expose all fields (if the schema is being filtered dynamically using the "only" option, and there is a user role that produces an empty value for "only").

criterions.comment: python-marshmallow package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.0b14-1').
